item.title: About Me
item.description:
My name is Li Haoxuan (李昊轩). I received my bachelor’s degree in Electronic Engineering from Shanghai Jiao Tong University. Now I am employed by Lilith Games.

This blog is concerned about Game development, Learning notes and Sharing my life. Please contact me by Email if you have any questions.
